content: Select one of the suggested modes, or use Custom to configure all the parameters manually.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message that explains how to select an embedding mode for the SDK. It appears as part of a user interface element that prompts users to choose between suggested modes or manually configure parameters. The purpose is to provide context and clarity for users making settings choices.

usage.context:
</CategoryDescription>
 <CategoryHeader>
 {t("SelectModeEmbedding", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </CategoryHeader>
 <Text lineHeight="20px" color={theme.sdkPresets.secondaryColor}>
 {t("InitializeSDK")}
 </Text>
 <PresetsContainer className={`${isFlex ? "presets-flex" : ""}`}>
 {presetsData.map((data) => (
 <PresetTile
 t={t}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'لتشكيل جميع الإعدادات' is not the best rendering of 'to configure all the parameters'. A more accurate translation would be 'لتكوين جميع الإعدادات' or 'لضبط جميع الإعدادات'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: حدد أحد الأوضاع المقترحة أو استخدم مخصص لتكوين جميع الإعدادات يدويا.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Fərdi' should be 'Xüsusi'. 'Fərdi' translates to 'individual' which doesn't fit the context of a configuration mode.
The phrase "μη αυτόματα" is an awkward translation of "manually." It implies "not automatically" but doesn't convey the meaning of manual configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Επιλέξτε έναν από τους προτεινόμενους τρόπους λειτουργίας ή χρησιμοποιήστε το «Προσαρμοσμένη» για να ρυθμίσετε όλες τις παραμέτρους χειροκίνητα.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Προσαρμοσμένη' should be within quotes as it appears to be a specific UI element.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Επιλέξτε έναν από τους προτεινόμενους τρόπους λειτουργίας ή χρησιμοποιήστε το «Προσαρμοσμένη» για να ρυθμίσετε όλες τις παραμέτρους χειροκίνητα.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'suggested modes' is better translated as 'options de mode' or 'modes proposés' to accurately reflect the English meaning. 'suggestions de mode' implies recommendations, which isn't the intent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Choisissez l'une des options de mode ou utilisez le mode Personnalisé afin de configurer manuellement tous les paramètres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase " ձեռքով կարգավորելու համար" is a bit clunky. While technically correct, a more natural and fluent translation for 'manually configure' would be something like 'ձեռքով ավարտելու համար' or 'ձեռքով ծրագրելու համար'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ընտրեք առաջարկվող ռեժիմներից մեկը կամ օգտագործեք Custom՝ բոլոր պարամետրերը ձեռքով ավարտելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word '맞춤화를 이용하여' (using customization) is a bit awkward and doesn't directly translate the meaning of 'Custom'. A more natural phrasing would be '맞춤 설정' or '직접 설정'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 제안된 모드 중 하나를 선택하거나 직접 설정을 이용하여 모든 매개변수를 수동으로 구성하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the sentence structure is a little long and could be slightly improved for readability in Korean. Consider splitting it if possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 제안된 모드 중 하나를 선택하거나, 맞춤 설정을 사용하여 모든 매개변수를 수동으로 구성할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Custom' as 'Pielāgots' is accurate, but it may not be the most natural phrasing in this context. 'Custom' often refers to a specific setting or mode name. A more contextually appropriate translation might be 'Manuāli' (Manually) or retaining 'Custom' as is, depending on UI consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Manuāli' or retaining 'Custom' for consistency and natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Niestandardowe' which, while technically correct, is a bit formal for a user-facing interface. A more user-friendly term like 'Ręczne' or 'Zaawansowane' might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wybierz jeden z sugerowanych trybów lub użyj opcji Ręczne, aby ręcznie skonfigurować wszystkie parametry.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Particularizat' is not the most natural or common translation for 'Custom' in this context. 'Personalizat' would be a better choice, as it more closely conveys the meaning of customizing or tailoring the parameters.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selectați unul dintre modurile sugerate sau utilizați modul Personalizat pentru a configura manual toți parametrii.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අභිරුචි තෝරන්න' for 'Custom' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of configuring parameters manually. 'අභිරුචි' primarily means 'preference' or 'taste', not 'manual configuration'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: යෝජිත ප්‍රකාර වලින් එකක් තෝරන්න හෝ සියලුම පරාමිති අතින් මානුෂීයව සැකසීමට 'අභිරුචි' තෝරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is a bit long and could be improved for readability in Sinhala. Splitting it into two sentences might make it easier to understand.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: යෝජිත ප්‍රකාර වලින් එකක් තෝරන්න.  හෝ සියලුම පරාමිති අතින් මානුෂීයව සැකසීමට 'අභිරුචි' තෝරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'režima' is misspelled. It should be 'režima'.

The translation 'Önerilen modlardan birini seçin veya tüm parametreleri manuel olarak yapılandırmak için Özel seçeneğini kullanın.' is a bit literal and awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be 'Önerilen modlardan birini seçebilir veya tüm parametreleri manuel olarak yapılandırmak isterseniz 'Özel' seçeneğini kullanabilirsiniz.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Önerilen modlardan birini seçebilir veya tüm parametreleri manuel olarak yapılandırmak isterseniz 'Özel' seçeneğini kullanabilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Custom" as "користувацький режим" is a bit awkward. While technically correct, it's a longer and less natural way to say it. A more natural translation might be "власний режим" or simply "налаштування".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Виберіть один із запропонованих режимів або використовуйте власний режим, щоб налаштувати всі параметри вручну.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "自定义" (Custom) should be enclosed in quotes to match the English phrasing and to clearly indicate it's a button label or a specific term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 在建议的模式中选择一项，或使用“自定义”手动配置所有参数。
